getAll_GivenValidViewModels_ReturnsValid.summary: Given valid view models test that if GetAll can return valid view models.

getAll_GivenEmptyViewModels_ReturnsEmpty.summary: Given empty view models test that if GetAll can return empty view models.

getAll_GivenNullViewModels_ExpectExcepti.summary: Given null view models test that if GetAll can throw exception.

getById_GivenValidViewModel_ReturnsValid.summary: Given valid view model test that if GetById can return valid view model.

getById_GivenNullViewModel_ReturnsNull.summary: Given null view model test that if GetById can return null.

add_CanCallServiceAdd.summary: Test that add is working properly.

update_CanCallServiceUpdate.summary: Test that update is working properly.

delete_CanCallServiceDelete.summary: Test that delete is working properly.
